column4: Baghbar - Gurala village | Land erosion is going on at Gurala village of jania Mouza under Baghbar Rev circle by the river Beki, due to the erosion 19 nos. Of families lost their land and now they have shifted their houses to safe places in the same village. (Reported date_ o7/09/2022) | 103

Gohpur - Marginal embankment at the L/Bank of river Solengi | Erosion damaged the Marginal embankment at Ch.700m on L/B of river Solengi on 07-09-2022. Launching of tree branches , bamboo bundles continued | 0

Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022. One (1) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=45 Female=50 Child=30 Pregnant=0 Disability=0Total=125(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Total Inmates-125. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 07.09.2022, Total Population-125 erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 07.09.2022. | 0
Bengtal - Burijhar No.2 | As reported by BDO, Sidli Chirang, erosion occurred at village No.2 Burijhar on R/B of river Aie on 05-09-2022 measuring L- 20m, B- 5m, D- 5 m. | 0

Kadam - Bhimpara Chapori | Erosion occured due to the River Subansiri Length 1 Hect. informed by concerned Lot Mondal and Gaon Pradhan From 01-09-2022 to 07-09-2022. | 0,  North Lakhimpur - Khaga Ghancharai | A breach-like damage has occurred on Subansiri R/B embankment at Ghancharai due to severe bank migration of river Subansiri. Shifting of embankment is in progress Reported by North Lakhimpur water resources department, from 05-09-2022 to 07-09-2022. | 0
Laharighat - Leruamukh | As per report of Water Resources Dept on 06/09/2022 & 07/09/2022, continuous erosion is seen Leruamukh with 5m and 4m respectively in both the days | 0
Naduar - Kanyaka farm | Active bank erosion is observed today i.e. 07/09/2022 near Kanyaka of river Jiabharali . Lat- 26°45’29’’ Long- 92°52’50’’ | 0
